needs: Oyin seeks to drive measurable improvements in customer success metrics such as expansion ARR and churn reduction by implementing efficient onboarding, renewals, and expansion processes. They require clear outcome definitions, early identification of unknowns, and maintaining simplicity to ensure scalable, data-driven iterations within part-time constraints and cross-functional collaboration.
personality: Oyin operates with an empathetic, coaching-led style valuing clear accountability and transparent communication. They prefer pragmatic, outcomes-first approaches that emphasize experimentation, incremental progress, and data-informed decision-making. Their collaboration is inclusive and structured around aligned signals, documented decisions, and maintaining momentum through lightweight, visible artifacts.
